DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study and 12 month extension is to evaluate the effects of two investigational drugs on osteoporosis in postmenopausal women.
DOC.brief_title: A Study and 12 Month Extension to Evaluate Two Investigational Drugs in Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis (MK-0217-907)
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal women with osteoporosis Any known allergy to the study drug
